00024 //! enable and initialize the uart
00025 void uart0Init(uint16_t baud, uint8_t mode, uint8_t fifomode)
00026 {
00027     // set port pins for UART0
00028     PINSEL0 = (PINSEL0 & ~U0_PINMASK) | U0_PINSEL;
00029 
00030     U0IER = 0x00;                         // disable all interrupts
00031     U0IIR;                                // clear interrupt ID
00032     U0RBR;                                // clear receive register
00033     U0LSR;                                // clear line status register
00034 
00035     // set the baudrate
00036     U0LCR = ULCR_DLAB_ENABLE;             // select divisor latches 
00037     U0DLL = (uint8_t)baud;                // set for baud low byte
00038     U0DLM = (uint8_t)(baud >> 8);         // set for baud high byte
00039 
00040     // set the number of characters and other
00041     // user specified operating parameters
00042     U0LCR = (mode & ~ULCR_DLAB_ENABLE);
00043     U0FCR = fifomode;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int uart0SendByte(int data)
00047 {
00048     while(!(U0LSR & ULSR_THRE))     // wait for TX buffer to empty
00049         continue;                       // also either WDOG() or swap()
00050 
00051     U0THR = (uint8_t)data;
00052     return (uint8_t)data;
00053 }
00054 
00055 int uart0GetByte(void)
00056 {
00057     if(U0LSR & ULSR_RDR)                // check if character is available
00058         return U0RBR;                   // return character
00059     return -1;
00060 }
00061
